appName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

appDesc.message: Automatic voting on ratings for projects or servers (gaming)
appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

disabledNotifWarnTooltip.message: For example, a notification that you have already voted (This is when the extension tried to vote for the project but you yourself have already voted)

disabledCheckTime.message: Disable time checking at extension start

disableCheckProjects.description: Checkbox. Disable check when adding a project

disableCheckProjectsTooltip.message: Disabling this check-up is not recommended, it can cause errors in the extension and it can break the auto-voting process, this setting disables check-up when adding a project, check-up for MCRate (As you know, you can vote there only for once per day) It also disables the VK authorization This setting is not saved when saving the configuration
disableCheckProjectsTooltip.description: Tooltip. Disable check when adding a project

priorityTooltip.message: When this option is enabled and after adding a project, the project will be prioritized, and will be first to vote without a delay of 10 minutes

enabledSilentVoteTooltip.message: Quiet Mode (Recommended) - Vote for projects entirely in the background without opening any tabs. Emulation mode - emulates a real user, opens a tab and clicks on the voting button, it's better to leave at least one open tab in the browser, otherwise the browser will be open on top of other windows and may cause inconvenience.

notAddedAll.message: You haven't added anything here yet

notAdded.message: You haven't added any projects to this voting page yet!
notAdded.description: Notification. You haven't added any projects

notAvailableInSilent.message: This is not available in silent mode by default!
notAvailableInSilent.description: Notification. available in silent voting mode

firstInstall.message: Thanks for installing the extension. For further work you should configure it first!

firstSettingsSave.message: Settings were successfully set by default and saved

settingsUpdateEnd2.message: Settings were successfully set by default and saved

confirmDisableErrors.message: Are you sure you want to disable error notifications? If any problem when voting happens, the extension will try to vote again every 5 minutes. If you don't receive errors and don't keep track of them, the extension might endlessly try to vote. Be careful with this, you might get blocked for spamming requests

confirmDisableCheckProjects.message: Are you sure you want to disable verification when adding a project? If you make an error when adding a project, voting might fail

confirmPriority.message: Are you sure you want to give priority to this project? When you enable priority, if you don't have precise time set this may lead to late voting. Set the precise time (accurate to seconds) and don't change it for correct voting process

oneProjectFairTop.message: You can only vote for one project on FairTop at once. In order to vote for multiple projects, do not allow FairTop.in to save cookies, google how to do it. Then disable check-up when adding a project in the advanced settings and try adding this project again. Be careful with the project ID: when adding a project with disabled check-up, extension will accept project even with a non-existent ID.

oneProjectMinecraftIpList.message: On MinecraftIpList, you can only vote for 5 projects at once.

oneProject.message: On $project$, you can only vote for 1 project at once

notConnectInternet.message: It seems that you don't have an Internet connection or page is not available, see the details in the console

notFoundProjectCode.message: There is no such project! HTTP response: $code$

notFoundProjectRedirect.message: There was a redirect, most likely there is no such project! Check the URL:

notConnectInternetVPN.message: It seems that you don't have an Internet connection or page is not available (Are you from Ukraine? Enable the VPN and keep it enabled while auto-voting), see the details in the console

authVK.message: To vote on $project$, authorization via VK is required

notConnect.message: Failed to connect to $url$, HTTP response: $code$

warnSilentVote.message: Please note that $top$ is not available in silent voting mode

cooldownChanged.message: You must restart the extension to apply changes. After restarting, open settings again. Restart the extension?

storageError.message: An error occurred while reading the config: $error$

storageErrorSave.message: An error occurred while saving settings: $error$

disableNotifInfo.message: Notifications about successful voting are disabled

disableNotifStart.message: Notifications about voting start are disabled

closeTab.message: Do you want to close this tab?

projectIDTooltip.message: of the project can be obtained from the address bar of project page, for example:

gameIDTooltip.message: of the game can be obtained from the address bar of project page, for example:

inputProjectIDOrList.message: Enter an ID or select from the list

feedback.message: If you have any questions or problems, feel free to contact us at

internetDisconected.message: Vote is initiated, but Internet connection is lost, waiting for it to resume...

errorOpenTab.message: Error occurred while opening the tab:

errorRedirected.message: Voting error! Redirection to the unknown page occurred: $url$ Check this URL

errorVoteNoElement.message: Voting error, it seems some necessary element/button is missing. Report this error to the extension developer

errorVoteNoElement2.message: Error! It seems that some necessary element (button or input field) is missing. Here's what we know: $error$. Report this error to the extension developer

errorVoteNoNick.message: Voting error! Redirection to the unknown page occurred: $url$ Check this URL

errorVoteNoNick2.message: Unexpected error, could not find the project. URL: $url$

errorVoteUnknown.message: Error when voting! Here's what we know:

errorVoteNetwork.message: Error when voting! Error code: $code$ URL: $url$

errorNextVote.message: Next voting attempt will be made in $minutes$ minutes

timeStamp.message: the time stamp is set to

errorblock.message: Failed to connect to api.cifrazia.com, $error$ If you don't have precise time set, extension will not work properly

errorClock2.message: Failed to connect to api.cifrazia.com, HTTP response: $httpCode$. If you don't have precise time set, extension will not work properly

clockInaccurate.message: It seems that your time is $count$ $unit$ $inaccurate$. The extension will not work properly, please set the precise time

secondBonus.message: On $project$ you need to collect the reward as well, let's automate this?

redirectedSecondBonus.message: There was a redirect to $url$, but looks like you are not logged in, or there is another problem. Check this URL

countVote.message: How many votes make per day

warnSilentVoteTooltip.message: This rating will always work in emulation mode (regardless of the voting mode setting). It is set so because this top has a ReCaptcha that's impossible to bypass. We do not recommend adding more than 1 project to one voting page where ReCaptcha is active. ReCaptcha operates on the trust factor, if you pass it too often, then ReCaptcha may ask you to solve it again(select images where 'paste any object here' is shown), which this extension doesn't know how. Also if you are using a proxy or VPN then ReCaptcha's trust factor may not work

useMultiVote.message: Use VK and Proxy when voting (enable MultiVote)

notAuthAcc.message: You are not logged in to $acc$

errorCheckSchemeProxy.message: Unable to determine the type of proxy, this proxy is probably dead.

privacyPass2.message: extension to get 5 free captcha passes for hCaptcha

deletedNotWokingProxies.message: All non-working proxies were successfully deleted!

deletedAllAcc.message: All $acc$ cookies and tabs were successfully deleted!

privacyPass4.message: and follow the instructions. After set the cookies on hCaptcha, install any extension that can edit the cookies in the browser, for example

privacyPass5.message: and extend the validity of all cookies for the domain hcaptcha.com for a few years

randomizeTooltip.message: The time of the next vote will be randomized within 0-12 hours, this is mainly necessary to make it harder for server admins to assume that you are using auto-voting

now.message: There is a vote going on right now...

timeout.message: Vote expecting time has expired, restarting the vote

repeatAttemptLater.message: Ignore the 'You have already voted' error at least 15 times

chooseGame.message: Enter the game ID or select from the list

chooseGameURL.message: Enter the game URL or select from the list

timeoutMS.message: Timeout in ms. since the last vote

timeoutHour.message: After the certain time (once per day)

customTimeOut.message: Customize the time of the next vote (timeout)

lastDayMonth.message: Apply custom timeout only on the last day of the month

lastDayMonth2.message: on the last day of the month

openPopupAcc.message: Opening $acc$ authorization window. After authorization, close the authorization window

notAuthVKTop.message: This VK account is not authorized for the following ratings:

authOK.message: Auth is OK, the account has been added

notAcceptAuth.message: click to log in. If you are not going to vote on the listed ratings then just ignore this message

discordLogIn.message: You must be logged in to upvote discord bots!

auth.message: Only registered users can vote on this rating. Please log in or register.

emptySite.message: It seems that this rating responded with an empty page, try to visit this page and then try adding again

ordinalWorldTooltip.message: World count number is the number that is located in the list of selected worlds when voting

requiredNick.message: Where's the nickname? There is no Steam authorization button so i need a nickname and it's necessary

alertCaptcha.message: There is a captcha on this rating page that the extension cannot pass, you will need to manually pass it, the extension will notify you about this.

notificationsDisabled.message: Notifications are disabled or the extension doesn't have access to them! You may miss important notifications from this extension about errors or warnings!

enableSyncStorage.message: Save extension settings in the cloud

enableSyncStorageTooltip.message: Enabling this setting is not recommended if you have a lot of entries in the list of added projects. The cloud has limited traffic and storage space. For this to work, your browser must be logged in to the account and have synchronization enabled, otherwise settings will be saved to local storage no matter what Allows you to synchronize extension settings with multiple computers, but keeping the extension with this setting enabled on multiple computers is not recommended

settingsSyncCopySuccess.message: Settings were successfully copied to the cloud

settingsSyncCopyLocalSuccess.message: Settings were successfully copied to local storage

proxyTBTokenExpired.message: The TunnelBear token is null or expired, I'm trying to get a new one...

proxyTBAuth2.message: Log in using the following link: https://www.tunnelbear.com/account/login Voting suspended for 24 hours

alreadyVotedRepeat.message: You have already voted, we are going to try again with a different proxy...

alreadyVotedFail.message: All attempts have expired, you have already voted, most likely someone with this nickname has already voted

errorAuthProxy2.message: Exceeded the maximum number of login attempts, most likely the username or password is incorrect

proxyAuth.message: The proxy requires authorization, I log in...

proxyAuthOther.message: Proxy $proxy$ requires authorization, I log in...

errorAuthProxyTB.message: The TunnelBear token is null or it has expired, there is nothing to log in to the proxy with! Voting suspended for 24 hours

errorAuthProxyNoPassword.message: This proxy requires authorization by username and password but you did not set it in the proxy

loginTB.message: To import a proxy from TunnelBear, authorization is required,

errorAttemptVote.message: Exceeded the maximum number of voting attempts, $error$

proxyBLSet.message: Black list of proxy sites updated

otherProxy.message: Some other extension on the VPN/proxy is interfering with us, disable these extensions and then we can manage the proxy. Voting suspended for 24 hours

oauthVK.message: The $rating$ app requests access to your account.

notFast.message: Not so fast, wait for the function to run

voteMode.message: Force the voting mode to be set

multivoteMode.message: Force the MultiVote mode to be set

enabledMultiVoteModeTooltip.message: Sets the MultiVote mode separately for the project being added, ignores the general MultiVote switching setting

useProxyOnUnProxyTop.message: Use a proxy on ratings where no proxy is used (TopCraft, McTOP and MinecraftRating)

confirmDeleteAcc.message: All cookies and $acc$ tabs will be deleted, do you agree?

update1.message: Due to the limitations of the Chrome API, we can not determine in which folder you have installed the extension, specify in which folder you have installed the extension and then allow access to the specified folder

update2.message: We check whether you specified the correct folder location

update3.message: This extension is not installed in this folder, specify the folder that you specified when installing this extension ($error$)

update4.message: Download a backup copy of the extension settings in case the update fails

update5.message: We delete all files and folders of the extension for subsequent updates

update6.message: We turn to git for a list of new files

update7.message: If you have installed Chrome or Windows antivirus, you may notice a lags after the update, this is normal, antivirus software checks the downloaded files

update8.message: The extension has been updated successfully, restart the extension for the changes to take effect

errorSelectSiteRating.message: The 'Rating Site' is specified incorrectly, select the one you need from the list

antiBanVK.message: Register an account on TopCraft and McTOP

antiBanVKTooltip.message: Sets the password for the account on TopCraft and McTOP after logging in to the VK. After that, when voting on the specified ratings, authorization is not carried out through the VK but using the set password, which allows you to vote on the specified ratings even when the VK account is in the ban. Do not delete your VK account from the extension if it is banned and if you vote on the specified ratings, the extension will continue to use it

antiBanVKStart.message: We begin to set the password on $rating$

antiBanVKEnd.message: The password $password$ was successfully set to $rating$

autoAuthVKStart.message: I automatically allow access to account $rating$

autoAuthVK.message: Automatically allow access to your VK account ratings

confirmAutoAuthVK.message: Do you agree to transfer personal information and email address from subsequent added accounts to ratings? (TopCraft, McTOP, MCRate, MinecraftRating, MonitoringMinecraft, and QTop)

tryManuallyUpdate.message: If the error persists, try updating the extension manually

importVKRequred.message: You didn't check the box next to it

saveVKCredentials.message: Save your account username and password for a note

confirmSaveVKCredentials.message: Do you really want to save the username and password you entered for your account? This data will be stored in an unencrypted form and can be stolen by a third-party program (virus or Trojan))

deleteAllRating.message: Do you really want to delete all the added projects on this rating?

conflictSyncMessage.message: There are already settings in the cloud, which settings should we use?

notGrantUrl.message: You did not grant the extension access to rating(s), adding it is not possible

grantUrl.message: Grant the extension access to rating(s)

oldSettings.message: Old type settings were found (chrome.storage), I convert them to the new type (IndexedDB)

randomizeInput.message: Specify the randomization limits (min and max) in milliseconds

passageCaptcha.message: reCAPTCHA/hCaptcha works on this rating, if you are often asked to pass a captcha manually (select images), you can find out how to solve this problem
